snippet: A proposed casino would pose a major threat to forests that provide refuge for wildlife and clean drinking water for millions in New York and New Jersey.
abstract: Editorial opposes casino operator Genting Group's plan to build casino complex in Tuxedo, NY, community surrounded by Sterling Forest; says casino would damage Sterling Forest watershed, which provides clean drinking water for millions of residents in New York and New Jersey; urges New York to reject Genting's bid, despite company's deep pockets.
lead_paragraph: A proposed casino would pose a major threat to forests that provide refuge for wildlife and clean drinking water for millions in New York and New Jersey.
